Export.Routine:
WWWLNG4(SPRACHE) ;WWWLNG4;DT;LOESCHEN SPRACHENFELDER;04.12.2001 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| LOESCHEN SPRACHENFELDER ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| DT 04.12.2001 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; ;SPRACHE=ZU LÖSCHENDE SPRACHE ;Language ;Z.B. DO ^WWWLNG4("FR") ;LÖSCHEN FRANZÖSISCHE SPRACHE ;AUS TEMINALMODE ;out of NEW NACH,Q,F,N,O,N,VON SET NACH=$GET(SPRACHE) QUIT:SPRACHE="DE" QUIT:SPRACHE="EN" QUIT:NACH="" SET Q=0 SET YM=0 SET Y="~" SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^INPARA(YM,F)) QUIT:F="" DO . KILL ^INPARA(YM,F,NACH) . QUIT IF $DATA(^WWW009(0,NACH)) DO . KILL ^WWW009(0,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW100(0,F)) QUIT:F="" DO . KILL ^WWW100(0,F,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW101(0,F)) QUIT:F="" DO . KILL ^WWW101(0,F,NACH) . QUIT QUIT:Q=1 SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW003(0,F)) QUIT:F="" QUIT:Q=1 SET N="" FOR SET N=$ORDER(^WWW003(0,F,N)) QUIT:N="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW0031(0,F,N,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,F)) QUIT:F="" QUIT:Q=1 SET N="" FOR SET N=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,F,N)) QUIT:N="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW0041(0,F,N,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW002(0,F)) QUIT:F="" QUIT:Q=1 SET N="" FOR SET N=$ORDER(^WWW002(0,F,N)) QUIT:N="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW0021(0,F,N,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW001(0,F)) QUIT:F="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW0011(0,F,NACH,1) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW122(0,F)) QUIT:F="" QUIT:Q=1 SET N="" FOR SET N=$ORDER(^WWW122(0,F,N)) QUIT:N="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW1221(0,F,N,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW1210(0,F)) QUIT:F="" QUIT:Q=1 SET N="" FOR SET N=$ORDER(^WWW1210(0,F,N)) QUIT:N="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW1211(0,F,N,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW1203(0,F)) QUIT:F="" DO . KILL ^WWW1203(0,F,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW120(0,F)) QUIT:F="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW1201(0,F,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,F)) QUIT:F="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW124(0,F,NACH) . QUIT SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW127(0,F)) QUIT:F="" QUIT:Q=1 SET N="" FOR SET N=$ORDER(^WWW127(0,F,N)) QUIT:N="" QUIT:Q=1 SET O="" FOR SET O=$ORDER(^WWW127(0,F,N,O)) QUIT:O="" DO QUIT:Q=1 . KILL ^WWW127(0,F,N,O,NACH) . QUIT SET VORG(1)="WWW009,WWW100,WWW101" SET YQ=1 DO ^WWWSORT QUIT
KILLHELP(SPRACHE) ;LOESCHT FALSCHE HILFETEXTE SET Y="~" SET F="" FOR SET F=$ORDER(^WWW127(0,F)) QUIT:F="" SET N="" FOR SET N=$ORDER(^WWW127(0,F,N)) QUIT:N="" SET O="" FOR SET O=$ORDER(^WWW127(0,F,N,O)) QUIT:O="" DO . SET A=$TRANSLATE($PIECE($GET(^WWW127(0,F,N,O,SPRACHE,1)),Y,1),"| ") . IF $LENGTH(A)=4 IF +A'=0 WRITE F,"/",N,"/",O,"=",A,! KILL ^WWW127(0,F,N,O,SPRACHE,1) . QUIT QUIT
